revised_title: The Life and Career of Wilfrid Bennett Lewis
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Wilfrid Bennett Lewis, a prominent engineer and scientist. Born into a family with a strong engineering tradition, Lewis made significant contributions to radar technology and nuclear research during his career. He worked on various projects, including lighthouse design and the development of nuclear power in Canada. His life and achievements are chronicled in this article, highlighting his passion for science and engineering.
